mapper.select: update INSBAgreementpaymethod set operator = #{operator},modifytime = #{modifytime},noti = #{noti},deptid = #{deptid},agreementid = #{agreementid},providerid = #{providerid},paychannelid = #{paychannelid},channelmanagerid = #{channelmanagerid} where id = #{id}
select p.id, p.paychannelname, c.codename AS paytypename FROM insbpaychannel p LEFT JOIN insccode c ON c.codetype = 'paytype' AND c.codevalue = p.paytype
